channel.title: What company is your favorite?
channel.description:
What is [i]your[/i] favorite gaming console company?
Popular Choices; - Microsoft (Xbox, Xbox 360, Xbox One) - Sony (PlayStation, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4) - Nintendo (Gameboy, Nintendo DS, Nintendo 64, GameCube, Wii, Wii U)
If there's anything else that you want on the list for others to remember, just comment them below. But, I wanna know what you think the best company would be. :)
My opinion: Microsoft, I feel like they're more professional and give more security rather than Sony at the most part.

item.title: What company is your favorite?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:19, topic:548625”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=667535.msg4464764#msg4464764 date=1419397957]

I like how everyone is picking PC as if the computer itself is a company.

I vote Steam + humble bundle.
Steam is amazing at making games cross platform and there’s a huge variety of games.
Humble bundle because they give back to developers, while allowing people to donate to charities and etc, all while getting full games. I’m sure Steam helps them in some way or another… But that only adds to my point.

Don’t be a smart arse if you’re going to make just as much of a random fudge up as the rest of them. Steam isn’t a company you goon, it’s a program. Valve are the company.

Steam can be directly related to one company, unlike PC, which isn’t owned by a single company.
[/quote]
Stop trying to cover your tracks and leave it at that. You made a mistake while calling others out for a similar mistake, don’t be a monumentous runt.[/quote]
While my point is still correct, yes, I did make a mistake. And you’re right on that.

Read full topic

item.title: What company is your favorite?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:18, topic:548625”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=667535.msg4464761#msg4464761 date=1419397199]

I like how everyone is picking PC as if the computer itself is a company.

I vote Steam + humble bundle.
Steam is amazing at making games cross platform and there’s a huge variety of games.
Humble bundle because they give back to developers, while allowing people to donate to charities and etc, all while getting full games. I’m sure Steam helps them in some way or another… But that only adds to my point.

Don’t be a smart arse if you’re going to make just as much of a random fudge up as the rest of them. Steam isn’t a company you goon, it’s a program. Valve are the company.
[/quote]
Steam can be directly related to one company, unlike PC, which isn’t owned by a single company.[/quote]
Stop trying to cover your tracks and leave it at that. You made a mistake while calling others out for a similar mistake, don’t be a monumentous runt.

People make mistakes, don’t call them out on it if you’re just as prone to the similar mistakes that they are, it’s common sense.

Read full topic

item.title: What company is your favorite?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

The best platform? PC gaming.

The best company for gaming through that platform? Idk I’m a fan of Valve purely because of CS:GO and BI purely because of the ArmA series and DayZ but it could go on for fucking days. Both companies are pretty shit but they keep me happy.

Read full topic

item.title: What company is your favorite?

item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Microsoft I suppose, seeing as my OS is going to be 8.1

Back when I was younger I’d say Nintendo without a doubt. Playing my Pokéboy SP.

item.title: What company is your favorite?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

although i have nearly all gaming consoles, i feel as though ive outgrow the older systems especially all handhelds. i find myself playing gamecube and n64 every now and then, but only nostalgic titles such as smash bros and mario kart/party.

i play my 360/ps3 nearly every day, im not too big of a fan on the xbox one or ps4 though my dad and brother get good use of them.

i feel like microsoft has done the best in the long run so far, but feel like sony is catching up and may take the lead when/if morpheus is released at a good time/affordable cost/quality product.

Read full topic

item.title: What company is your favorite?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Playstation since day one! I got my first Playstation product (A PSP) when I was around 7, loved playing on it. Then eventually got a PS1, PS2, and PS3. Still haven’t gotten the PS4
Not going to lie, I have an xbox 360 aswell; xbox cares more about security, whereas playstation is more about the actual gaming.

Read full topic

  • Sony (PlayStation, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4)

If there’s anything else that you want on the list for others to remember, just comment them below. But, I wanna know what you think the best company would be.

My opinion: Microsoft, I feel like they’re more professional and give more security rather than Sony at the most part.
